name: Juicy Moose - Fall 2018 - 470
description:
Chuck, the bartender, came to work one morning to find that Buck, the moose, has stolen all Chuck’s juice again! Now, Buck is running amuck in the storage cellar, and Chuck must find a way to get his juice back and chase the moose out of his bar! Will you help Chuck in his endeavor?

Play as Chuck, the Canadian bartender, and guide him through mazes in the storage cellar rooms. As you guide him, you must collect juice and mix drinks he can consume to gain awesome juice powers! Use these powers to help him through the mazes and get to Buck at the end of each one!
